summary: All six requirements are substantially implemented. The diff includes a sticky navigation bar, hero section, services section with six cards, about us section, contact form with backend persistence, and a consistent light blue/white theme. All acceptance criteria appear to be addressed across the implemented files.

hallucinated_features.description: A Footer component with brand logo, quick links, services list, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution was added.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention a footer component. While it is a common website element, it was not requested in any REQ.

hallucinated_features.description: Stats row in the Hero section showing '10+ Years Experience', '200+ Projects Delivered', '50+ Enterprise Clients', and '6 Core Services'.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 specifies a headline, subheadline, and CTA button for the hero section. The stats row with specific numeric claims was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Contact sidebar with company address, email, and phone number displayed alongside the contact form.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5 only specifies a contact form with Name, Email, Subject, Message fields and a Submit button. The contact info sidebar was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication infrastructure including InternetIdentityProvider, useInternetIdentity hook, and AuthClient integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly lists user authentication or login functionality as a non-goal. This infrastructure was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: An 'Explore Services' secondary CTA button in the Hero section that scrolls to the Services section.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 specifies only one CTA button linking to the Contact section. A second CTA was not requested.
